game.name: Trixology
game.description:
Are you a seriously a big fan of tetris style block puzzles? Join Trixology and forget all the classic puzzles you have tried ever before! Your objective in this brand new arcade challenge is to rotate the blocks and slide them from right or left to create lines. Make sure that they will drop down on the right spots to help you score bigger in the end. Use your mouse on keyboard or tap the screen on mobile phone to control the blocks!

Rotate the squares or any other shaped blocks to place them on the appropriate positions on the grid! Dropping them down will help them to adjust on the chosen position faster! Get ready to put your wisdom and puzzle-solving abilities to the test to create the highest score in the end of classic Tetris puzzle game! Make sure to build neat and clean rows without any gaps to boost your score. Each row you complete will be vanished away while leaving more space for other blocks to move around on the grid. 

Covering a full without gaps will help you to earn some extra bonus points. Avoid creating a huge pile of blocks as you would lose the game immediately if they reach the top of the grid! This html5 block challenge needs your perfect judgment and skill. Try not to be in hurry since you would have the option to choose the speed in all the levels of this lovely retro style puzzle! Enjoy multiple features like rotate clockwise/counterclockwise, accelerate and speed down! Difficulties keep increasing as you progress in the game
